name: Gmail Trigger
semantic_context: Fetches emails from Gmail and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.
natural_language_description: 这是 Gmail Trigger 节点。主要用于: Fetches emails from Gmail and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: messageReceived

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeSpamTrash (值: None) - Whether to include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results
includeDrafts (值: None) - Whether to include email drafts in the results
labelIds (值: None) - Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
q (值: None) - Only return messages matching the specified query
sender (值: None) - Sender name or email to filter by

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName (值: None) - Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachment. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is 'attachment_' the first attachment is saved to 'attachment_0'.
downloadAttachments (值: None) - Whether the email's attachments will be downloaded
